overview: A crab washes up on a deserted beach and is frightened by the shadow of a swooping bird. The scene changes to a woman and child working outside their house. They are frightened by the sound of helicopters in the distance. The scene changes again; a crab (the same one?) washes up on a deserted beach and is frightened by the shadow of a bird. Written by yortsnave
title: Moebius Play
